H0.text: What was the name of the meeting held in July 1945 to discuss punishment of Nazi Germany. Yalta Conference

H1.text: What was the name of the meeting held in July 1945 to discuss punishment of Nazi Germany. Berlin Summit

H2.text: What was the name of the meeting held in July 1945 to discuss punishment of Nazi Germany. Postdam Meeting

H3.text: What was the name of the meeting held in July 1945 to discuss punishment of Nazi Germany. Potsdam conference

A4.text: The Potsdam Conference (German: Potsdamer Konferenz) was held at Potsdam in the Soviet occupation zone from 17 July to 2 August 1945
